reviews.review: a
Хуета ебаная
ну вроди все норм пока. только багов многовато(
I now have nightmares related to this game.

Pros:
Always get penetrated at least once per game (by hook of course)
Most likely you will be dead by or before daylight
Playing with friends and letting them die so you can escape is satisfying
When killers can't kill you and you teabag and leave is so satisfying

Cons:
People yelling at you about depip or pipping when you just wanna escape
Ranking system is a joke and stressful (play with friends to get there) im rank 10 in less then a few games 
Lots of pay to unlock rather than just unlocking unfortunately
DLC more like you need to buy to enjoy the game better

Personal:
I bought this game during alpha to support it but it was super duper glitchy i mean i get it its an alpha. After 6 years (Yes after 6 years of owning this) I finally started playing the game since most of my friends got the game for free or bought it from the hype. This game is hilariously scary and hectic with friends as with randoms you just can't predict anything and just think what would you do to someone you don't know. I barely play killer but the mechanics are better than most of these other rip offs out there. I give this game a total of 7 out of 10. Best part is if you play more you might learn how to survive being chased by a killer in real life too!
very good game
solid game
Fun game either solo or with friends! I recommend :)

Дуже навіть непогана гра в режимі 4 проти 1. Гра дуже скило залежна. Потрібно вчитися мансити, грати за кожного сурва чи маніяка окремо, аби розуміти їхню механіку. Грати цікавіше за маніяків. Кожен вбивця має власну здатність. Наприклад: Кошмар (Фредді Крюгер), вміє розставляти сільки сну, які при взаємодії з вижившим, занурює його в сон і накладає дебафф, тим самим підсвічуючи сурва крізь стіни. Також силки сну на короткий проміжок часу трохи сповільнює сурва. З мінусів у грі численні баги та дуже велика кількість чітерів. Але загалом – рекомендую
It's a time sink, but it's fun.

The game is good but we literally wait hours for the game to find a match, and when it does one of us always disconnects from the lobby or enters the match alone. Then we create another lobby, the same things happen again. Please fix this problem. Sometimes the game finds a match without any problem, consider yourself lucky if this happens. There were a lot of times we waited, then  found a match but the killer was a camper, teammates didn't work at all. So if you're considering to buy this game, make sure you're patient  enough and again, dbd team please fix the lobbies, servers, matchmaking system.
